abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Pino's Prime Meats, open since 1992 in tiny SoHo storefront that has been a butcher shop, under varied ownership, since 1906.
lead_paragraph: A fixture for decades, Pino’s Prime Meats is the last culinary shop on its block of Sullivan Street.

headline.main: An Old-School Butcher Shop Endures in SoHo

snippet: A fixture for decades, Pino’s Prime Meats is the last culinary shop on its block of Sullivan Street.
